初中词汇.example: She has the ability to solve difficult problems. 她有能力解决难题。
Plants absorb water from the soil. 植物从土壤中吸收水分。
He accepted my invitation happily. 他高兴地接受了我的邀请。
There was a car accident on the road. 路上发生了一起车祸。
We accomplished the task ahead of time. 我们提前完成了任务。

He acknowledged his mistake openly. 他公开承认了自己的错误。
She acquired many skills during her internship. 她在实习期间学到了很多技能。
Actions speak louder than words. 行动胜于言语。
He is very active in class discussions. 他在课堂讨论中非常积极。
It takes time to adapt to a new environment. 适应新环境需要时间。
Please add some sugar to my coffee. 请给我的咖啡加点糖。
He gave me his new address. 他给了我他的新地址。
I admire her courage and determination. 我钦佩她的勇气和决心。
He admitted that he had made a mistake. 他承认自己犯了错。

The army advanced towards the city. 军队向城市前进。
Living in the city has many advantages. 住在城市里有很多好处。
The movie is full of exciting adventures. 这部电影充满了刺激的冒险。

Thank you for your valuable advice. 感谢您宝贵的建议。
I advise you to study harder. 我建议你更加努力地学习。
The weather affected our travel plans. 天气影响了我们的旅行计划。
We can't afford such an expensive car. 我们买不起这么贵的车。
She is afraid of spiders. 她害怕蜘蛛。

I agree with what you said. 我同意你说的话。

I will meet you at the airport. 我会在机场接你。
